tweet: The inability for the masses to recognize what it will take to move this space forward has me incredibly bullish on $LINK. Their faces so deep in STO’s, protocols, dapps etc., they don’t realize connectivity is the biggest hurdle. ChainLink is positioned to spark this revolution.

For those who want me to chart only in $LINK / $BTC, and not $USD, the bottom line is that LINK shouldn't be held hostage to BTC. LINK is a tech play and BTC is an "improved" gold play. Personally, I think LINK is far more important.
@TheCryptoDog $LINK $TOMO and others have been steadily doing so since july / august 🧐  https://t.co/7c1JYqZSPQ
